name: Human Harvest (GregorMack)
description:
*… Today is a good day to harvest …*

Human Harvest is an arcade scroller in which you need to abduct as many humans as you possibly can. But be carefull, they have weight and it will affect your controls!

**TEAM**

This game was created in Unity by the following team:

Wazti- Lead Programmer, Project Leader

Tusya - Game designer, UI artist

Pixel_Error - Sound designer, Music composer, Second programmer

Gregormack- Artist

**CONTENT WARNINGS:**

May cause addiction!

**TIPS:**

To succesfully collect humans you need to fly up to the mothership.

Energy bar is your timer, once it depleted, you will be returned without gatherings.

**CONTROLS:**

Select: Mouse or Trackpad.

Move: WASD.

Pull: Space

Accelerate: Shift

Web version sucks.

Thank you for playing!
